inclusion.criterion: Patients presenting to the emergency department
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients without loss of consciousness and with certain neurological causes (e.g. recurrent epilepsy, hemiplegia at presentation)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 65 yo man with history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope was admitted earlier today evaluation of syncope and ventricular arrhythmias.
